org.hl7.meta
Interface MessageTypeLoader

All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageTypeLoaderAdapter
public interface MessageTypeLoader

An interface to factories that manufacture MessageTypeImpl instances. Implementations include:

  • AccessMessageTypeLoader -- loads message type metadata from repository Access database
  • JdomMessageTypeLoader -- loads metadata from XML extract produced by RoseTree

    • Author:
    Skirmantas Kligys (skirmis@hotmail.com)

    Method Summary
     void close()
              Closes DB connections if they are open.
     MessageType loadCmet(java.lang.String id)
              Loads the CMET metadata and returns the reference to the metadata object for the message type.
     MessageType loadMessageType(java.lang.String id)
              Loads the message type metadata and returns the reference to the metadata object for the message type.
     

    Method Detail

    loadMessageType

    MessageType loadMessageType(java.lang.String id)
                            throws LoaderException
    Loads the message type metadata and returns the reference to the metadata object for the message type. Note that referenced CMETs are not loaded automatically, but only on demand when the corresponding association is actually traversed.

    Parameters:
    id - the message type ID
    Returns:
    the message type metadata
    Throws:
    LoaderException - if loading fails

    loadCmet

    MessageType loadCmet(java.lang.String id)
                     throws LoaderException
    Loads the CMET metadata and returns the reference to the metadata object for the message type. Note that referenced CMETs are not loaded automatically, but only on demand when the corresponding association is actually traversed.

    Parameters:
    id - the message type ID
    Returns:
    the message type metadata
    Throws:
    LoaderException - if loading fails
